comments.html: I'm aware of only 2 Cisco IOS-XR customers who asked for (and used partially) UCMP for ISIS during the last 10 years. Implementation was done on CRS and ASR9k. The first one did want to implement bundle/link aggregation (even for ECMP) and had different link speeds between 2 routers. He used UCMP instead of mixed speed bundles. The second one had almost the same use case for overseas interconnection with continent across long-distance/exotic transmission links. Fred
comments.name: Fred Cuiller
